c1.name: Planning Breeds Success
c1.descriptionRaw: The Base DMG for Lunar-Bloom reactions caused by Nefer's <color=#FFD780FF>Phantasm Performance</color> is increased by 60% of her Elemental Mastery. This effect is also boosted by <color=#FFD780FF>Veil of Falsehood</color>.
c1.description: The Base DMG for Lunar-Bloom reactions caused by Nefer's **Phantasm Performance** is increased by 60% of her Elemental Mastery. This effect is also boosted by **Veil of Falsehood**.

c2.name: Observation Feeds Strategy
c2.descriptionRaw:
Enhances the effects of the Ascension Talent <color=#FFD780FF>A Wager of Moonlight</color>: Extends <color=#FFD780FF>Veil of Falsehood</color>'s duration by 5s, and increases its stack limit to 5, as well as causing <color=#FFD780FF>Phantasm Performance</color> to deal up to 140% of its original DMG. When Nefer unleashes her Elemental Skill <color=#FFD780FF>Senet Strategy: Dance of a Thousand Nights</color>, she will instantly gain 2 stacks of Veil of Falsehood. Additionally, when Veil of Falsehood reaches 5 stacks, or when the fifth stack's duration is refreshed, Nefer's Elemental Mastery will be increased by 200 for 8s instead.
You must first unlock the Ascension Talent "A Wager of Moonlight."
c2.description:
Enhances the effects of the Ascension Talent **A Wager of Moonlight**: Extends **Veil of Falsehood**'s duration by 5s, and increases its stack limit to 5, as well as causing **Phantasm Performance** to deal up to 140% of its original DMG. When Nefer unleashes her Elemental Skill **Senet Strategy: Dance of a Thousand Nights**, she will instantly gain 2 stacks of Veil of Falsehood. Additionally, when Veil of Falsehood reaches 5 stacks, or when the fifth stack's duration is refreshed, Nefer's Elemental Mastery will be increased by 200 for 8s instead.
You must first unlock the Ascension Talent "A Wager of Moonlight."

c3.name: Deceit Cloaks the Truth
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Senet Strategy: Dance of a Thousand Nights</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of **Senet Strategy: Dance of a Thousand Nights** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Delusion Ensnares Reason
c4.descriptionRaw:
When Nefer is on the field and in the <color=#FFD780FF>Shadow Dance</color> state, you will gain Verdant Dew 25% faster.
Additionally, while Nefer is in the Shadow Dance state, nearby opponents will have their <color=#99FF88FF>Dendro RES</color> decreased by 20%. When Nefer exits the Shadow Dance state or after she strays a certain distance away from the opponents, this effect will be removed after 4.5s.
c4.description:
When Nefer is on the field and in the **Shadow Dance** state, you will gain Verdant Dew 25% faster.
Additionally, while Nefer is in the Shadow Dance state, nearby opponents will have their Dendro RES decreased by 20%. When Nefer exits the Shadow Dance state or after she strays a certain distance away from the opponents, this effect will be removed after 4.5s.

c5.name: Opportunity Hides in the Margins
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Sacred Vow: True Eye's Phantasm</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of **Sacred Vow: True Eye's Phantasm** by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Victory Flows from the Turning of Tides
c6.descriptionRaw:
When Nefer unleashes <color=#FFD780FF>Phantasm Performance</color>, the second stage of DMG dealt by herself will be converted to deal <color=#99FF88FF>AoE Dendro DMG</color> equal to 85% of her Elemental Mastery. Additionally, when the attacks from Phantasm Performance end, an extra instance of <color=#99FF88FF>AoE Dendro DMG</color> equal to 120% of Nefer's Elemental Mastery will be dealt. All of the aforementioned DMG is considered Lunar-Bloom DMG dealt by Phantasm Performance.

<color=#FFD780FF>Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam</color>
Nefer's Lunar-Bloom DMG is <color=#FFD780FF>elevated</color> by 15%.
c6.description:
When Nefer unleashes **Phantasm Performance**, the second stage of DMG dealt by herself will be converted to deal AoE Dendro DMG equal to 85% of her Elemental Mastery. Additionally, when the attacks from Phantasm Performance end, an extra instance of AoE Dendro DMG equal to 120% of Nefer's Elemental Mastery will be dealt. All of the aforementioned DMG is considered Lunar-Bloom DMG dealt by Phantasm Performance.

Moonsign: Ascendant Gleam
Nefer's Lunar-Bloom DMG is **elevated** by 15%.
